column4: First Sunday of Advent [1] Violet
column8:
Sunday 27 November 2022

First Sunday of Advent [1] Violet
Week of Advent 1
FIRST SUNDAY OF ADVENT [1] Violet
Year A/1

EUCHARIST
Isaiah 2:1-5
Psalm 122
Romans 13:11-14
Matthew 24:36-44

DAILY PRAYER: Anticipation
Isaiah 52:1-12
Revelation 14:13 - 15:4
Matthew 24:15-18

ALTERNATIVE PSALMS
Morning: Psalm 9
Evening: Psalm 2

COLLECT
Stir up your power, Lord, and come: 
that, with you as our protector, 
we may be rescued from our sins;
and with you as our deliverer,
we may be set free; 
for you live and reign with God the Father, 
in the unity of the Holy Spirit, 
one God, world without end.

The following Collect may be used to conclude the Intercession throughout Advent, or as the Prayer after Communion as an alternative to the Prayers in section 24 of the Scottish Liturgy 1982.

Almighty God,
give us grace to cast away the works of darkness
and to put on the armour of light,
now in the time of this mortal life,
in which your Son Jesus Christ came to us in great humility:
that on the last day,
when he shall come again in his glorious majesty
to judge the living and the dead,
we may rise to the life immortal;
through him who lives and reigns with you,
in the unity of the Holy Spirit,
one God, world without end.
